Generation VII.Sun: It controls its water balloons with song . The melody is learned from others of its kind and is passed down from one generation to the next.
Generation VII.Moon: Its singing voice is its chief weapon in battle. This Pokémon's Trainer must prioritize the daily maintenance of its throat at all costs.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Also known as a songstress, it has a fantastical look on moonlit nights when it leads its colony in song.

Generation VIII.Sword: With its mouth, it makes sonic waves that sound like beautiful singing. It uses the sonic waves to control its water balloons. *
Generation VIII.Shield: For Primarina, every battle's a stage. Its singing and the dancing of its balloons will mesmerize the audience. *

Generation IX.Scarlet: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.
Generation IX.Violet: Also known as a songstress, it is a sight to behold on moonlit nights when it sings in front of the colony it leads.
